dmca.title: Fraud site - www.motordealservice.com
dmca.body:
_____  

From: Brandon Abbey [mailto:babbey@escrow.com] 
Sent: Thursday, June 23, 2005 10:30 AM
To: The Planet Policy Enforcement; copyright@theplanet.com
Cc: ifcc33@ic3.gov; la.ectf.reports@usss.dhs.gov
Subject: Fraud site - www.motordealservice.com
Importance: High


It appears you are hosting a fraud site at - www.motordealservice.com

 

This notice is provided in accordance with the U.S. Digital Millennium
Copyright Act. The undersigned is authorized to act on behalf of Escrow.com
and its affiliated licensed escrow services providers, Internet Escrow
Services ("IES") and EC Services Corporation ("ECSC").  It has been brought
to our attention that your company provides services to a website,
www.motordealservice.com which is infringing on Escrow.com's intellectual
property rights to the material posted on Escrow.com (www.Escrow.com
<http://www.escrow.com/> ).  This site claims an affiliation with our
companies and there is none.  This site has also stolen content from
Escrow.com for the purpose of defrauding consumers attempting to buy and
sell over the Internet.  Please disable this site immediately

 

Following is a direct link to one of the offending pages of the
www.motordealservice.com site,
http://motordealservice.com/index.php?action=terms Neither Escrow.com nor
IES has any affiliation with  <http://www.motordealservice.com>
www.motordealservice.com and has a good faith belief that use of the
material in the manner complained of is not authorized by the copyright
owner, its agent or the law.  

 

The information contained in this notice is accurate, and under penalty of
perjury, this office is authorized to act on behalf of Escrow.com.  

 

 

 
Brandon W. Abbey
Managing Director
Escrow.com
16275 Laguna Canyon Road
Irvine, CA  92618
Direct - 949-790-5880
Fax - 949-790-5811
